title: Two shot inside home on Market Street in Wilmington
content:
Two people were shot Tuesday night inside a home along North Market Street, according to Wilmington police.
Officers were called about 7 p.m. to the 200 block of N. Market Street for the report of a "possible accidental shooting investigation," said Sgt. Andrea Janvier, a spokeswoman with the department.
Those arriving on scene found a 21-year-old woman with a gunshot wound to her abdominal area and a 27-year-old man with a gunshot wound to his left hand, Janvier said.
Both were treated at the scene by New Castle County paramedics and then transported to Christiana Hospital. Their conditions were not released by police Wednesday, she said.
STORY: 60-year-old man shot by Wilmington police identified
The circumstances of the shooting remain under investigation, Janvier said.
Anyone with information should contact Detective Joran Merced at (302) 576-3637.
Contact Brittany Horn at (302) 324-2771 or bhorn@delawareonline.com. Follow her on Twitter at @brittanyhorn.
